name: ColdForestRL
description:
This is my submission to #MyFirstGameJam. ColdForest RL is supposed to be a Roguelike where you try to survive in a, surprise, cold forest, by trying to maintain your warmth through the levels.

I only became aware of the Jam about a week after it started and was only able to start working on it a couple days later, so the game is still a bit crude. But i do plan on working further on it. 

I only have the windows version for now, but i may as well export for mac/linux
